data.name: Pumpkin Farmer
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Pumpkin Farmer!



Story base:

Pampoen has lost his pumpkin. Will you be the one to help him find it or will you find something else along the way?

There is only one way to find out isn't there?.

Follow the Pampoen as he goes through the ups and downs in his quest to find his pumpkin. There will be adventure, Twists and Turns. Oh and pumpkins, can't forget about looking for the pumpkin...

Features:

There are a few mini games along the way.
The game may be short but I hope that it leaves a long lasting impression.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The genre? 2D. The theme? Emotional. mechanics? You look for the pumpkin. Appeal? It should connect with you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in
  • Additional Notes: Will run on a potato
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 or Higher || Ryzen 3 or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: If you want.
  • Additional Notes: Try adding extra RGBs
